entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather and a wizard. He is mentioned as someone Harry can talk to about his vision.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has had a disturbing vision and is seeking advice from Sirius.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard and the headmaster of Hogwarts. Harry mentions that he doesn't tell him anything anymore.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A wizard who was attacked by a snake in Harry's vision.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: An object that allows people to travel from one place to another instantly.

relationships.description: Harry has Sirius as his godfather, which is why he can talk to him about his vision.
Harry is a student of Dumbledore's at Hogwarts.
Sirius has Harry as his godson, which explains why he can offer guidance and support.
Harry used the Portkey to travel with Dumbledore.
